medical_history.chief_complaint: Right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain associated with nausea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was awoken from sleep at midnight. The pain has persisted in the RUQ and has intermittently radiated to her back. She has not experienced vomiting and last ate pizza at 10 PM the previous evening.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Hypertension (HTN) 2. Mitral valve prolapse (MVP) 3. Macular degeneration 4. Previous left toe surgery.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with mitral valve prolapse (MVP) and stroke.
